intro: Elatostema hezhouense, commonly known as the Hezhou Elatostema, is a rare species of flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettle and related plants. The plant is characterized by its small, heart-shaped leaves and clusters of tiny white flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, typically in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
